page.title: 04LIFESTYLES.THE VICAR'S DAY.
page.content: A typical day in the life of{The {Rev.Basil Brenton.} {6:00}rise for private prayers. {7:00}do household chores. {8:00}Celebration of Holy Communion. {8:00}have breakfast,read letters. {10:00}visit the Parish especially the sick. {11:00}visit Homelands Nursing Home. {12:30}prepare and eat lunch. {2:00 }visit the Parish {2:45 }teach at St.Peter's School. {3:30 }continue visiting. {5:30 }Tea at The Vicarage. {6:00} Evensong at Church. {6:30 to 9:00}Interviews at Vicarage. {9:00}Supper and relaxation. {11:00}Prepare for bed and "pillow prayers".I ask God to accept my day's work and I pray for those I have visited during the day.Finally I ask for God's Blessing before sleep.
